nodes.text: Mak Eak was a Dathomirian Zabrak male from the planet Dathomir who was a member and former leader of the Nightbrothers during the Clone Wars. Prior to the Second Battle of Dathomir of 19 BBY, he met with Ruul, a fellow Nightbrother, in a warehouse-like building on a mission for the run-away Nightbrother Arzo Suun to help steal supplies for Eak himself. Eak and Ruul were eventually caught by a group of Nightsisters led by Nelsel, who detected the Nightbrothers' presence through the Force.
Mak Eak was mentioned in Collapse of the Republic, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
